_header: When Saint Stephen was at Jerusalem
_description: A carol for St. Stephen’s Day — five quatrains with refrain element, ‘…lapidauerunt stephanum’ and burden: ‘Nowe syng we both all & sum / Lapidauerunt stephanum’

OxfBal354.First Lines:
Whan seynt Stevyn was at JeruzalemGodis lawes he loved to
                    lerne…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…Pray we all þat now be hereVnto seynt stephyn þat
                    master clereLapidauerunt StephanumExplicit
OxfBal354.Facsimiles:
Early Manuscripts at Oxford University: Facsimile
                    of Oxford, Balliol MS 354.
         (http://image.ox.ac.uk/show?collection=balliol&manuscript=ms354).
